_meta.description: Structured lineage data for drawing and connecting dots. Each node: id, name, relation, lineage, spiritual_contract, birth_place, parent_ids, cleansing_notes. Optional: spiritual_twin_id = another node id in this file or entity id in data/spiritual_twin_entities.json.
